qas.question: What do some fans like to do?
What has the internet done for wrestling fans?

answers.text: exposure to worldwide variations of wrestling

qas.question: Many companies who handle wrestling footage have been founded since what decade?
What companies did WWF purchase in 2001?

context: Some fans enjoy a pastime of <a0_0>collecting tapes of wrestling shows<a0_0/> from specific companies, of certain wrestlers, or of specific genres. The Internet has given fans <a1_0>exposure to worldwide variations of wrestling<a1_0/> they would be unable to see otherwise. Since the <a2_0>1990s<a2_0/>, many companies have been founded which deal primarily in wrestling footage. When the WWF purchased both <a3_0>WCW and ECW<a3_0/> in 2001, they also obtained the entire past video libraries of both productions and have released many past matches online and on home video.
